name: WordPressDarkReader
description:
This prevents the WordPress reader from having specific banner alterations by the provider that you may not want to view.

For example, this will prevent the display of the eyestrain-causing Rainbow banner that they are forcing on people as part of their efforts to stray from being a speech platform and enter the field of being a propaganda platform.

user.name: AffSeda
user.about: I am a freelance author/developer that does not believe that service providers of free speech should take sides in something, nor attempt to force their issue onto others.
